entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming south 20 near noon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:50 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
